job_purpose: To leverage expertise in asset management within the mining industry to enhance predictive maintenance and asset health monitoring.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Utilize familiarity with fixed plant equipment to analyze maintenance data and optimize asset performance
Connect key datasets related to asset health to enhance predictive maintenance strategies
Conduct equipment failure investigations by analyzing required data sets
Apply reliability engineering concepts to improve asset reliability and performance
Participate in the Asset Management Platform (AMP) project to develop comprehensive solution architecture
Contribute to the Proof of Concept (PoC) use case focusing on specific assets like conveyors, reclaimers, or screenhouses
Integrate data from multiple sources into Databricks for real-time insights into asset health
Develop Failure Modes and Effects Analysis (FMEA) into application logic for predictive capabilities enhancement
required_qualifications: Experience in maintenance roles related to fixed plant equipment
Proficiency in analyzing asset health datasets and connecting key datasets
Knowledge of equipment failure investigations and required data analysis
Ability to work on the integration of data sources for real-time insights
Experience with Failure Modes and Effects Analysis (FMEA) is a plus
company_details: The company is a key player in the mining industry, focusing on innovative solutions for asset management and predictive maintenance. They are committed to leveraging data analytics to optimize operational efficiency and asset performance.
